objects.description: [Zen](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0494) can install itself on the system partition to achieve persistence. [Zen](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0494) can also replace `framework.jar`, which allows it to intercept and modify the behavior of the standard Android API.(Citation: Google Security Zen)

external_references.description: Siewierski, L. (2019, January 11). PHA Family Highlights: Zen and its cousins . Retrieved July 27, 2020.
